5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever catches one Rak’ah of Friday prayer or other than it, then he has caught the prayer.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أَدْرَكَ مِنَ الْجُمُعَةِ رَكْعَةً
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who catches one Rak’ah of Friday Prayer
